text: Treatment options for newly diagnosed lymphoblastic lymphoma     Lymphoblastic lymphoma may be classified as the same disease as acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL). Treatment options for lymphoblastic lymphoma may include:            -  Combination chemotherapy. CNS prophylaxis with radiation therapy or chemotherapy is also given if cancer has spread to the brain and spinal cord.     - A clinical trial of chemotherapy with different regimens for CNS prophylaxis.     - A clinical t
